subtasks: Add 1-2 new thoughts or tasks that come to mind.
Categorize or tag one existing item.
Check your fridge and pantry for existing ingredients (10 mins).
Browse 1-2 quick dinner ideas online for inspiration (15 mins).
Choose 3 simple main meals for the next 3-4 days (10 mins).
List the specific ingredients you'll need for those 3 meals (10 mins).
Add the missing ingredients to your grocery list.
Open a new document or note for vacation planning.
Brainstorm 1-2 potential destinations OR dates (15 mins).
Do a quick 10-minute search for flights/accommodation prices for one option.
List 2-3 activities or sights you'd like to experience there (10 mins).
